meaningMnemonic: A <radical>samurai</radical> puts his <radical>forehead</radical> on the <radical>table</radical> next to his <radical>weapon</radical>. He is just a <kanji>husk</kanji> of his former self. This <kanji>shell</kanji> of a samurai has nothing left.
readingMnemonic: The only way to bring a <kanji>husk</kanji> of a samurai back to life is to have a <reading>cock</reading> (かく) crow right in his ear.
